thread.title: Karthick Naren trolls Subramanian Swamy for blocking him on twitter - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Karthick Naren trolls Subramanian Swamy for blocking him on twitter - Tamil Movie News

title: Karthick Naren trolls Subramanian Swamy for blocking him on twitter - Tamil Movie News
text:
ALSO READ: Youngest director tells Old politician about understanding Kamal 
Apparently Subramanian Swamy had blocked Karthick Naren on his social media page to which the ‘Dhuruvangal 16’ director has trolled "I just put the title card, but you are already afraid, Guys please take of this fragile soul". It would be interesting to see what India’s most famous conspiracy theorist has to say about that.
